title: Contractors
text:
Contractors will need the following documents to have their bids accepted.
Please note that the EPA RRP Certificate will take at least a month to acquire.


Important! Please make sure your UEID is publicly searchable.
To see if an entity is searchable, go to sam.gov, create an account, and log-in.
Click on “Search” in the top navigation bar. On the next page, select Domain > Entity Information > Entities. Then, search for the Entity’s name.












A Shelby County Equal Opportunity Compliance (EOC) Number or a Locally Owned Small Business (LOSB) Number.





Comprehensive General Insurance: $1,000,000 minimum
Worker’s Compensation Insurance: $500,000 minimum
Automobile Liability: $1,000,000 minimum

The holder should be:
  Shelby County Attorney's Office
  Contract's Administration
  160 N Main Street, Ste. 950
  Memphis, TN 38103



This is required for all projects, lead or rehab.



This is only required for lead projects.

title: Lead Training
text:
An EPA/HUD RRP Certificate is required for all rehab and lead jobs.
Table of upcoming lead training classes
Form:

Email the completed form to kennethba…
Table of class costs.

Training Reimbursement
To be reimbursed for training, talk to Anita.

title: Lead Training
text:
An EPA/HUD RRP Certificate is required for all rehab and lead jobs.
To get an RRP license, you must attend a class by a state-certified lead instructor.


View a list of accredited Tennessee lead trainers.




Upcoming Classes






  
    
    
      Class
      Date
      Location
    
  
  
    NA
NA
NA
  
  
  




To request classes, email Kenneth Bakari at kennethbakari@phaseoneconsultants.com.

Class Locations
840 MLK Jr Ave, Memphis, TN 38126
1075 Mullins Station, W-2, Room 263, Memphis, TN 38134


Class Costs
Registration Fee is $25 if you pre-register or $50 the day of class.






  
    
    
      Class Name
      Initial
      Refresher

NA
$495
  
  
  






Registration
To pre-register, email the below form to email Kenneth Bakari at kennethbakari@phaseoneconsultants.com.

Download the completed form and email it to email Kenneth Bakari at kennethbakari@phaseoneconsultants.com.



Training Reimbursement
The SCDH has some funding available for partial reimbursement for Section 3 contractors.

To be reimbursed for training, contact Anita Tate at anita.tate@shelbycountytn.gov.
